## OctreeNodeChunk.clearNodes() method

Remove and clear all nodes in this chunk.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clearNodes(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Also detaches all scene nodes held by each `OctreeNode`<!-- -->.
